org.megatome.frame2.front
Class HttpRequestProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.megatome.frame2.front.HttpRequestProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestProcessor
public class HttpRequestProcessor
extends Object

A request models the execution of an HTTP request through the Event and the EventHandlers. It is a primary delegate of RequestProcessor, and brings together the data and logic necessary for processing the request.

Method Detail

getEvent

public Event getEvent()
               throws ConfigException
Get the event that is associated with the request in the configuration. The config entry: 
 <event name="displayUsers" type="test.org.megatome.app.user.DisplayUsers"/>
matches the event name "displayUsers" to a class. A request to http://somehost/webapp/displayUsers.f2 will invoke the DisplayUsers class.

Returns:
The event that is associated with the request in the configuration.
Throws:
ConfigException

getContextWrapper

protected org.megatome.frame2.front.ContextWrapper getContextWrapper()
Method getContext.

processRequest

public Object processRequest()
                      throws Throwable
Process the HTTP request. Processing an HTTP request involves the following steps:
  1. Populate the event from request parameters via introspection
  2. Step through all event handlers, passing in the populated event for each
  3. Forward to the appropriate location, based on returns from handlers

Returns:
Null
Throws:
Throwable
See Also:
RequestProcessor.processRequest()
